traits.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
traits.desc: The githzerai's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components: * At will: mage hand (the hand is invisible) * 3/day each: blur, expeditious retreat, feather fall, jump, see invisibility, shield * 1/day each: haste, plane shift, teleport

traits.name: Psychic Defense
traits.desc: While the githzerai is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.
